<title level="1" right="Hazard 23" pfs="">[Armageddon Orb](/Hazards.aspx?ID=465)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 100 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A roiling red orb, forged from a drop of the god [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291)’s blood, rains fire from the sky when a specified condition is met.

---

**Stealth**
DC 10 or [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1485)

**Disable**
DC 48 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) (legendary) to imbue a [thieves’ toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758) with aspects representing [Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=278) and [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292) and use them to drain away the orb’s power over 10 minutes; the character attempting this check takes 5 fire damage each round until the orb is depleted

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

**Burn It All** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604)) **Trigger** A special condition set by the trap’s creator occurs, typically the event of their death; **Effect** Fire rains from the sky in a 100-mile radius, dealing 10d6 fire damage to creatures and objects in the area. Each creature or object can attempt a DC 46 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2247) Reflex save. Any creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies instantly. This is not enough damage to completely burn away a forest or level an entire mountain or city, but it typically kills most creatures in the area.
name: Armageddon Orb
